scripts.typeorm:migration:generate:stagg: rimraf ./lib && tsc && yarn typeorm migration:generate -c stagg -n
scripts.typeorm:migration:generate:discord: rimraf ./lib && tsc && yarn typeorm migration:generate -c discord -n
scripts.typeorm:migration:generate:callofduty: rimraf ./lib && tsc && yarn typeorm migration:generate -c callofduty -n
scripts.typeorm:migration:run:stagg: rimraf ./lib && tsc && yarn typeorm migration:run -c stagg
scripts.typeorm:migration:run:discord: rimraf ./lib && tsc && yarn typeorm migration:run -c discord
scripts.typeorm:migration:run:callofduty: rimraf ./lib && tsc && yarn typeorm migration:run -c callofduty
